Function lProjektID AS long sSQL1="SELECT COALESCE(ProjektID,0) FROM Steuerung WHERE ClientID="& iClientID oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() lProjektID=oRecord1.getInt(1) Wend End Function

Function fAnzahlDatensaetzeProjekte(sTabelle as String,lProjektID as Long) as integer Dim oRecord1 as Object Dim sSQL1 as String sSQL1="SELECT count(*) from "& sTabelle &" where ProjektID="& lProjektID oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() fAnzahlDatensaetzeProjekte=oRecord1.getInt(1) Wend End Function
Function flProjektID_import as long sSQL1="SELECT Max(ProjektID) from "& sProjekte oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() flProjektID_import=oRecord1.getString(1) Wend End Function
Function flMax_Datensatz(sTabelle as String,sCol as String) as long sSQL1="SELECT Max("& sCol &") from "& sTabelle oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() flMax_Datensatz=oRecord1.getInt(1) Wend End Function
Function flProjektID_import_auto(iRefresh as integer) as string STATIC lProjektID_2 as String Dim sProjektID_1 as String,sProjektID_2 as String Dim sJahr as String,sJahr_1 as String,sJahr_2 as String Dim sMonat as String,sMonat_1 as String,sMonat_2 as String Dim iMonat as integer Dim sNummer_1 as String,sNummer_2 as String if iRefresh = 1 then sProjektID_1=flMax_Datensatz(sProjekte,"ProjektID") sJahr_1=Mid(sProjektID_1,1,4) sMonat_1=Mid(sProjektID_1,5,2) sNummer_1=Mid(sProjektID_1,7) sJahr=Year(Now) sMonat=Month(Now) iMonat=Month(Now) if iMonat<10 then sMonat= "0" & Month(Now) End if if sJahr_1=sJahr then sJahr_2=sJahr_1 sNummer_2=sNummer_1 else sJahr_2=sJahr sNummer_2="0001" End if if sMonat_1=sMonat then sMonat_2=sMonat_1 else sMonat_2=sMonat End if sProjektID_2=sJahr_2 & sMonat_2 & sNummer_2 lProjektID_2=sProjektID_2 End if flProjektID_import=lProjektID_2 End Function
Function GetDocUserProperty(sPropertyName as String) As String Dim oUserProps As Object ' On Error Resume Next oUserProps = oDoc.DocumentProperties.getUserDefinedProperties() if oUserProps.getPropertySetInfo().hasPropertyByName(sPropertyName) = True then GetDocUserProperty = oUserProps.getPropertyValue(sPropertyName) else GetDocUserProperty = "" end if End Function
